author: bodewig
msg: If the entry uses a data descriptor, size information is only available after trying to read the next entry.  This doesn't help the jar case as Java7's jar doesn't implement the spec correctly, will file a bug report with OpenJDK and ponder whether a work-around is possible.

author: rwonly
msg: GERONIMO-6059 New look and feel of Geronimo 3.0 admin console (Step 2, New UI design)

author: ebourg
msg: Removed the gump profile (the Gump config has been changed to work without this)

author: kkolinko
msg: Simplify mapping for jsp servlet in the default web.xml.
Multiple url-pattern values in the same servlet-mapping are supported since Servlet 2.5.

author: ebourg
msg: Updated the configuration to build Commons CLI without altering the maven.final.name property
